item.title: Generate AWS Keys
item.description:
You'll need your region, bucket name, AWS key and Secret in order to deploy your site to S3. 

Setup Policy

  • Log into your AWS Console
  • Go to Identity and Access Management
  • Policies > Get started > Create policies > policy generator
  • Add the following fields:

AWS Service: Amazon S3
Action: All actions selected (for simplicity)
ARN: arn:aws:s3:::your-domain.com/*

  • Click Add Statement
  • Now do the same thing without the /* at the end of your domain (in the ARN field)
  • Click Next and give the policy a new name that makes sense (forestry-policy).  Then click Create Policy

Attach Policy to a User

Go back to the Identity and Access Management dashboard and go to:

  • Users > create > name (name = forestry)
  • Click show credentials (be sure to copy or download these...they only appear once)
  • Close window then click on the row of the user you just created
  • Got to Permissions > Attach policy then search for the policy you just created
  • Save and your done!
